include.name: Viewmode_Visible_Plot
include.visible: [ Control.isVisible(100) + !Skin.HasSetting(List1_Sidebar_NoPlot) ] | [ Control.isVisible(110) + !Skin.HasSetting(List2_Sidebar_NoPlot) ] | [ Control.isVisible(120) + !Skin.HasSetting(List3_Sidebar_NoPlot) ] | [ Control.isVisible(200) + !Skin.HasSetting(Poster1_Sidebar_NoPlot) ] | [ Control.isVisible(210) + !Skin.HasSetting(Poster2_Sidebar_NoPlot) ] | [ Control.isVisible(220) + !Skin.HasSetting(Poster3_Sidebar_NoPlot) ] | [ Control.isVisible(300) + !Skin.HasSetting(Panel1_Sidebar_NoPlot) ] | [ Control.isVisible(310) + !Skin.HasSetting(Panel2_Sidebar_NoPlot) ] | [ Control.isVisible(320) + !Skin.HasSetting(Panel3_Sidebar_NoPlot) ] | [ Control.isVisible(900) + !Skin.HasSetting(Channel1_Sidebar_NoPlot) ] | [ Control.isVisible(901) + !Skin.HasSetting(Channel2_Sidebar_NoPlot) ] | [ Control.isVisible(902) + !Skin.HasSetting(Channel3_Sidebar_NoPlot) ]
